Level 45
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 45
By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 10:06 pm:

Stage 45

At the start, drop down and jump to the boxes just above the mummy. The rightmost box contains a big firework. Destroy and take it, than head left and jump down while holding on to the right(to take the key and NOT get scorch by the red flame.)

After that, create boxes and once the mummy comes to the left, box him in, so as to prevent it from harassing you later on.

Build boxes just above the red flames on the red end of the screen and stand on them, while all the time, boxing upwards. (Note: You can't make boxes at where the "bat wings" are located)

Get to the topmost layer and facing left, used your big fireworks against the ghost, make sure the mummy is not above you as the fireworks you shot out may curl back and kill the mummy just when it's above you, crushing you to death. After that, just stand on the tip and box a box and jump to victory. I know it's possible to win this stage without making use of the fireworks as well.
